Title Translated: Employment Agency: Bob does not come to Germany - Zeit.de
Description Translated: The Federal Employment Agency could use digitization to better bring job seekers and companies together.Money would be there.But will be missing and interest.
Original Title: Agentur für Arbeit: Bob kommt nicht bis Deutschland - zeit.de
Original Description: Die Bundesagentur für Arbeit könnte die Digitalisierung nutzen, um Arbeitssuchende und Firmen besser zusammenzubringen. Geld wäre da. Aber Willen und Interesse fehlen.

Title Translated: YouTube: Even more staff and artificial intelligence should keep the video platform clean - Googlewatchblog
Description Translated: As the operator of a popular and at the same time open platform, it is not easy: Users are responsible for what they upload and present their channels and sides, but in the end there are always negative things on the platform itself.With YouTube, Google currently has it special
Original Title: YouTube: Noch mehr Personal und Künstliche Intelligenz sollen die Videoplattform sauber halten - GoogleWatchBlog
